item.title: 空中客车公司称上半年交付 306 架飞机
item.description: 空中客车公司周二表示，今年上半年交付了 306 架飞机，比 2024 年同期的 323 架下降了 5.56%。【原文：Airbus said on Tuesday it delivered 306 airplanes in the first half of the year, down 5.56% from 323 in the same period of 2024.】

item.title: X 称印度政府命令其封锁路透社在印度的新闻账户
item.description: 印度政府上周直接命令 X 屏蔽 2000 多个账户，其中包括路透社新闻的两个账户，该社交媒体平台周二表示，这是对印度 "正在进行的新闻审查 "的一次尖锐的公开抨击。【原文：India's government last week directly ordered X to block more than 2,000 accounts, including two belonging to Reuters News, the social media platform said on Tuesday in a sharp public attack on "ongoing press censorship" in India.】

item.title: 监督机构负责人告诉普京，俄罗斯企业在跨境支付中使用净额结算、黄金和加密货币
item.description: 俄罗斯金融监管机构负责人周二告诉弗拉基米尔-普京总统，俄罗斯公司正在成功使用净额结算、黄金和加密货币来促进国际支付。【原文：Russian companies are successfully using netting, gold, and cryptocurrency to facilitate international payments, the head of Russia's financial watchdog told President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音公司 6 月交付 60 架喷气式飞机，其中 8 架交付中国，恢复交付
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，该公司 6 月份交付了 60 架飞机，与去年同期相比增长了 27%，其中 8 架飞机是在两国贸易争端结束后首次交付给中国客户。【原文：Boeing said Tuesday that it delivered 60 airplanes in June, a 27% increase compared to a year earlier, including eight to Chinese customers for the first time since a trade spat between the countries ended.】

item.title: 扎克伯格的 Meta 超级智能实验室在硅谷挖走顶尖人工智能人才
item.description: Meta Platforms 正在为其新成立的超级智能实验室（Superintelligence Labs）争夺顶级人工智能人才，以便更好地与包括 OpenAI、谷歌和 Anthropic 在内的竞争对手竞争。【原文：Meta Platforms is racing to secure top artificial intelligence talent for its newly created Superintelligence Labs to better compete with rivals including OpenAI, Google and Anthropic.】

item.title: 纽约联储：美国消费者对财务状况更满意，预期通胀稳定
item.description: 纽约联储周二发布的一份报告显示，上个月美国人对通胀的展望变化不大，因为家庭对自己的财务状况和获得信贷的能力的看法有所提高。【原文：Americans' outlook on inflation was little changed last month as households upgraded their views on the state of their finances and ability to get credit, according to a report released on Tuesday by the New York Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 美国农业部长表示 "不会特赦 "被驱逐出境的农场工人
item.description: 美国农业部长布鲁克-罗林斯（Brooke Rollins）周二表示，农业工人不会因特朗普政府驱逐所有非法入境移民的努力而获得 "大赦"。【原文：U.S. Agriculture Secretary Brooke Rollins said on Tuesday that there will be "no amnesty" for agricultural workers from the Trump administration's efforts to deport all immigrants in the country illegally.】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商拓展欧洲市场
item.description: 在全球向电动汽车转型的背景下，中国汽车制造商正在欧洲扩张，凭借有竞争力的价格和先进的技术打入传统上由欧美品牌主导的市场。【原文：Chinese automakers are expanding in Europe, betting on their competitive pricing and advanced technology to break into a market traditionally dominated by European and American brands, amid a global shift towards electric vehicles.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司重启以色列航线
item.description: 美国联合航空公司周二表示，将于 7 月 21 日重新启动飞往以色列特拉维夫的航线。【原文：United Airlines said on Tuesday that it would restart its services to Tel Aviv, Israel, on July 21.】

item.title: 解说员：拟议的欧盟-美国出口机制中的汽车赢家和输家
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，布鲁塞尔正在考虑做出一项潜在安排，允许从美国生产和出口汽车的欧洲汽车制造商以较低的关税率从欧盟进口汽车。【原文：Brussels is considering pursuing a potential arrangement that would allow European automakers that produce and export cars from the United States to import vehicles from the EU at reduced tariff rates, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道马里计划出售巴里克综合体的黄金储备为运营提供资金
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，巴里克矿业公司卢洛-古恩科托（Loulo-Gounkoto）联合企业的马里法院指定管理人计划出售该企业储藏室的一公吨黄金，因为该企业在暂停运营近六个月后将重新开始运营。【原文：The Malian court-appointed administrator of Barrick Mining's Loulo-Gounkoto complex plans to sell one metric ton of gold from the site's storeroom as operations commence again after an almost six-month suspension, two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 福特称密歇根电动汽车电池厂 "有望 "获得生产税收抵免
item.description: 福特汽车公司周二表示，该公司计划投资 30 亿美元的密歇根电动汽车电池厂已完工 60%，相信在大规模税收和预算法案修订相关规定后，该厂将有资格获得生产税收抵免。【原文：Ford Motor said Tuesday it believes its planned $3 billion Michigan electric vehicle battery plant, which is 60% complete, will qualify for production tax credits after a massive tax and budget bill revised the rules.】

item.title: 有线电视节目显示，鲁比奥假冒者在与外长通话时使用了人工智能
item.description: 据路透社周二看到的一份电报称，一名冒名顶替者在与三位外长和两位美国政界人士的接触中使用了人工生成的声音来冒充国务卿马可-鲁比奥。【原文：An imposter used an artificially generated voice to impersonate Secretary of State Marco Rubio in contacts with three foreign ministers and two U.S. politicians, according to a cable seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 好时任命温迪首席执行官柯克-坦纳为新任首席执行官
item.description: 好时周二任命汉堡连锁店温迪（Wendy's）的首席执行官柯克-坦纳（Kirk Tanner）为公司首席执行官，接替米歇尔-巴克（Michele Buck），自 8 月 18 日起生效。【原文：Hershey on Tuesday named burger chain Wendy's chief Kirk Tanner as its CEO, effective August 18, replacing Michele Buck.】

item.title: 由加密货币重量级企业支持的 ReserveOne 将在纳斯达克上市，融资超过 10 亿美元
item.description: ReserveOne 是一家新成立的加密货币控股公司，与业内资深人士和前美国商务部长都有联系，该公司周二表示，将通过空头支票交易在纳斯达克上市，预计将融资超过 10 亿美元。【原文：ReserveOne, a new cryptocurrency holding company with ties to industry veterans and a former U.S. commerce secretary, said on Tuesday it will list on the Nasdaq through a blank-check deal that is expected to raise more than $1 billion.】

item.title: 英国前首相苏纳克加盟高盛担任高级顾问
item.description: 投资银行高盛周二表示，英国前首相里希-苏纳克将重返高盛担任高级顾问。【原文：Former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak is returning to Goldman Sachs as a senior adviser, the investment bank said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体寻求美国证券交易委员会批准蓝筹加密货币 ETF
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团周二向美国市场监管机构提交的一份文件显示，该集团正寻求推出一只交易所交易基金，该基金将投资于多种加密代币，包括比特币、以太币、索拉纳币和瑞波币。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group is looking to launch an exchange-traded fund that will invest in multiple crypto tokens, including bitcoin, ether, solana and ripple, a filing with the U.S. markets regulator showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据共同社报道，受中国稀土限制影响，日产将缩减新型电动汽车的生产计划
item.description: 据共同社周二报道，由于中国的稀土出口限制导致零部件短缺，日产汽车公司正在缩减其新型聆风电动车的生产计划。【原文：Nissan Motor is scaling back production plans for its new Leaf electric vehicle model because China's rare earth export restrictions have led to a shortage of parts, Kyodo News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车的目标是到 2030 年，工业业务的有机销售额增长 3-5
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车公司（Daimler Truck）周二预计，在服务业的推动、欧洲向零排放车辆的转变、北美的职业卡车以及印度和国防部门的增长的推动下，到 2030 年，其工业业务的年有机收入将增长 3% 至 5%。【原文：Daimler Truck on Tuesday projected yearly organic revenue growth of 3% to 5% until 2030 in its industrial business, driven by a service push, a shift to zero-emission vehicles in Europe, vocational trucks in North America, and growth in India and the defense sector.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔将在 2026 年分拆之前审查两大业务的替代方案
item.description: 霍尼韦尔周二表示，在这家工业巨头准备进行三方分拆之际，将对其服务于运输和物流行业的两项业务进行战略评估。【原文：Honeywell said on Tuesday it would evaluate strategic alternatives for two of its businesses that serve the transportation and logistics industries as the industrial giant prepares for its three-way split.】

item.title: 意大利将不得不放弃合并条件的报道引发联合信贷银行和 BPM 股价上涨
item.description: 据媒体报道，布鲁塞尔将下令意大利政府撤回对该交易提出的条件，意大利第二大银行联合信贷银行及其收购目标 Banco BPM 的股价周二因此上涨。【原文：Shares in Italy's second biggest bank UniCredit and its takeover target Banco BPM rose on Tuesday on a media report that said Brussels will order the Italian government to withdraw the conditions it has put on the deal.】

item.title: IBM 推出新型芯片和服务器，致力于简化人工智能
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines）周二宣布推出一系列新的数据中心芯片和服务器，并称这些产品将比竞争对手更省电，并将简化在企业运营中推广人工智能的过程。【原文：International Business Machines on Tuesday announced a new line of data center chips and servers that it says will be more power-efficient than rivals and will simplify the process of rolling out artificial intelligence in business operations.】

item.title: 预订公司告诉法庭，欧盟否决 ETraveli 没有令人信服的证据
item.description: Booking Holdings 周二批评了欧盟在近两年前否决其价值 16.3 亿欧元（19 亿美元）的 ETraveli 交易的反垄断决定，称监管机构未能提供明确、令人信服的证据来证明反竞争损害。【原文：Booking Holdings on Tuesday criticised an EU antitrust veto over its 1.63-billion-euro ($1.9 billion) ETraveli deal almost two years ago, saying regulators failed to provide clear, compelling evidence to show anti-competitive harm.】

item.title: 你有邮件！
item.description: 欧洲、中东和非洲突发新闻市场通讯员 Lucy Raitano 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by EMEA Breaking News Markets Correspondent, Lucy Raitano.】

item.title: 私人投资平台 Linqto 在美国证券交易委员会审查下申请破产
item.description: Linqto是一个允许用户获取私有公司股票的投资平台，该公司于本周二申请破产，理由是涉嫌违反证券法。【原文：Linqto, the investment platform that allows users access to shares of privately held companies, filed for bankruptcy on Tuesday, citing challenges stemming from alleged securities law violations.】

item.title: 中国专车公司与百度 Apollo 合作推出自动驾驶汽车租赁服务
item.description: 中国专车公司周二表示，已与百度智能驾驶业务 Apollo 合作推出自动驾驶汽车租赁服务。【原文：China's Car Inc has launched an autonomous driving rental service with Baidu's smart driving business Apollo, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 南非称特朗普征收 30% 关税是基于对两国贸易关系的不正确认识
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收30%的关税进行了反击，称这是基于对两国贸易的不准确理解，并表示将继续与美国进行谈判。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa pushed back against U.S. President Donald Trump's imposition of a 30% tariff, saying that it was based on an inaccurate understanding of the two countries' trade and that negotiations with the U.S. would continue.】

item.title: Monzo 因金融犯罪过失被英国监管机构罚款 2800 万美元
item.description: 英国金融监管机构对数字银行 Monzo 处以 2100 万英镑（2857 万美元）的罚款，原因是其反金融犯罪系统存在缺陷，其中包括在客户入职时将伦敦地标性建筑列为其地址。【原文：Britain's financial regulator has fined digital bank Monzo 21 million pounds ($28.57 million) for failings in its anti-financial crime systems, which included onboarding customers who had listed London landmarks as their address.】

item.title: 随着交易的增加，激进投资者将推动变革
item.description: 未来几个月，激进派股东将更加努力地推动企业变革，随着交易步伐的加快，他们将找到新的信心来发起运动。【原文：Activist shareholders are poised to push harder for corporate changes in the coming months, finding fresh confidence to launch campaigns as the pace of dealmaking picks up again.】

item.title: 美联储寻找降息理由，调查和关税让答案难以捉摸
item.description: 最近对全国和全球企业高管进行的调查凸显了美国联邦储备委员会在确定美国经济面临的更大风险是增长放缓还是通货膨胀方面的两难处境，而利率决定则取决于决策者如何在仍然动荡的贸易环境中调和相互矛盾的信息。【原文：Recent national and global surveys of business executives have highlighted the U.S. Federal Reserve's dilemma in determining if slowing growth or inflation is the greater risk to the U.S. economy, with interest rate decisions hinging on how policymakers reconcile conflicting information in a still volatile trade environment.】
